name: Complete Chamber without Jumping
Walk up the stairs to Girl's Dormitory in Slytherin
Knock over 8 flower pots
Empty 10 armor stands
Activate both secrets in Willow from out of bounds
Have 15 potions
Get all of the beans in the chasm
Get all Challenge Stars in the Gryffindor Challenge
Get 5 secrets as Harry in Slytherin
Complete Boomslang without jumping
Finish with 2000 beans
Get all Goyle secrets
Activate a potion cauldron with a gnome
Get behind the Quidditch gate
Cast on 5 Lumos statues during Spongify
Get on top of Hagrid's Hut
Finish the game
Buy 8 Bronze Wizard Cards
Make a 5 mushroom high tower in Diffindo
Empty 5 bean boxes
Cut all Venomous Tentacula heads off in Boomslang
Enter Quidditch practice from out of bounds
Put 15 crabs into pits during Rictusempra
All Chamber secrets
Get all Grounds secrets in both day and night
